posts.title: About Me
posts.text: I’m a PhD student in Computer Science at Case Western Reserve University. My research primarily focuses on the software engineering, machine learning, system and blockchain security. Working Experience Software Engineer Intern, Google, 05/2022 - 08/2022 Research Intern, Palo Alto Networks, 05/2019 - 08/2019 Yelp Software Engineering Intern, 05/2018 - 08/2018 Pulications Graph Summarization on System Audit Logs for Attack Investigation [IEEE Security & Privacy 2022 Accepted] Back-Propagating System Dependency Impact for Attack Investigation [USENIX Security 2022 Accepted] iSyn: Semi-automated Smart Contract Synthesis from Legal Financial Agreements [ISSTA 2023] ContractFix: A Framework for Automatically Fixing Vulnerabilities in Smart Contracts [Under revision]

How to add new font for matplotlibAlthough matplotlib already provides many font choices, we may still need toadd some specific font style to make sure your paper draft’s font type is consistent. Based on my own experience, the simplest way is to add ttf file for matplotlib.To do that, the first step you need to download ttf file of your preferred font type.
